resources.string:
To cycle through puns, simply swipe up and down! 

To favourite a pun, press the favourite icon on the top-right corner! 

To share a pun, press the share icon on the top-right corner!

For help, press the help icon on the top-right corner!

To cycle through puns, simply swipe up and down! 

To delete a pun, press the trash icon on the top-right corner!

To share a pun, press the share icon on the top-right corner! 

For help, press the help icon on the top-right corner! 

The delete and share icons would not be available if no puns are saved.

To cycle through puns, simply swipe up and down! 

To favourite a created pun, press the favourite icon on the top-right corner! 

To edit a created pun, press the edit icon on the top-right corner!

To delete a created pun, press the trash icon on the top-right corner! 

To share a pun, press the share icon on the top-right corner! 

For help, press the help icon on the top-right corner!

The favourite, delete and share icons would not be available if no puns are created.
The setup is the part of the pun that sets up the laugh. (Eg. What does a house wear?) \n\nThe punchline is the part of the pun that makes you laugh. (Eg. Address.)
